pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenic close-up shot of a field of small yellow wildflowers, likely buttercups, in a lush green meadow. The camera's focus shifts, creating a soft, blurry effect on different parts of the field. The flowers sway gently throughout the clip, suggesting a light breeze.
